title: The permissible ground coverage shall be total plot area after deducting required marginal open space / setback areas from the plot boundaries
clause_text: The permissible ground coverage shall be total plot area after deducting required marginal open space / setback areas from the plot boundaries.
section: The Minimum Tenement Density to be achieved in S.R.S. :
